pin.terms:
1. Not allowed to print the received Voucher Code.
2. Voucher code can be used at All Indomaret Outlet, except in Maluku and Papua.
usage_info: 1. Show the voucher code to the cashier.
2. Check the merchant's name, the voucher value and the voucher code.
3. The cashier will input the code to do the payment.

pin.terms:
Upon acquiring the gift card, the acquirer of it fully accepts the terms and conditions set forth below, without reservation or exclusion.
Gift Card will be valid at any Farmacias Cruz Verde only.
Farmacias Cruz Verde are not liable in case of lost, damage or stole.
The amount paid for the gift card, It is the same by which it can be exchanged.
The gift card, can not be exchanged for cash at any establishment.
usage_info: Recipient will get via SMS a pin code to credit his/her Gift card.
Once pin code is delivered, Recipient in Guatemala can go to any Pharmacies Cruz Verde.
Cashier will provide a Gift card or credit an existing one if recipient had a previous gift card.
